description: The girl was rushed to hospital following the incident involving a BMW X1 in the Shawlands area of Glasgow.
title: Girl, four, in critical condition after being hit by car in Glasgow
title_page: Girl, four, in critical condition after being hit by car in Glasgow - BBC News
maintext:
A four-year-old girl is in critical condition in hospital after being struck by a car in Glasgow.
The accident involving a BMW X1 happened on Tantallon Road in the city's Shawlands at about 09:00.
Emergency crews attended and the road was briefly closed while the girl was taken to the Royal Hospital for Children, where she remains.
Sgt Ally Wright said inquiries into the incident were ongoing, but urged anyone who witnessed it to get in touch., external
He said: "We are keen to speak to any drivers who were in the area at the time and may have dashcam footage which has captured something of significance."
